"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c862b06368723827dc1000#post_54c862b06368723827dc1000
After molting tarantula's are at their most fragile state.
In fact, if you have a pet tarantula and you try to feed it live insects right after molting, you run the risk of the food hurting the spider.
